title: Hang Up: All Hail the Rams
description:
Joel Anderson, Stefan Fatsis, and Josh Levin talk about the Rams’ Super Bowl win over the Bengals. They’re also joined by David Epstein to discuss the decision to allow Kamila Valieva to skate in the Olympics. Finally, they assess the mega-trade between the Nets and 76ers.
 
Super Bowl (3:36): How Aaron Donald and Cooper Kupp led the Rams to victory.
 
Valieva (23:13): Why is the 15-year-old competing after testing positive for a banned substance?
 
NBA (45:20): Who won the James Harden for Ben Simmons swap?
 
Afterball (1:04:27): Joel on Sherman Lewis, who never got the chance to be an NFL head coach.
